extendedInfo.description: Get a Amazing Accurate Reading!This 51 full color card deck has channeled Messages. You choose the first 3 that "call out" to you, and the messages convey what is going on in your life at the time of choosing these cards. Giving guidance & direction.You can auto shuffle them, or slide and choose your cards.Along with the messages they include suggested crystals, hand mudras and essences for unique meditations for human advancement. The energy of the " Angels were  channeled  into each painting" and that pure energy, attracts you to pick it. You can feel the energy!  Jolie DeMarco an intuitive healer and psychic designed these cards through channeling the messages and art. She wanted to share the guidance and healing they portray. www.JolieDeMarco.com
